metadata.title: CVE-2024-25082 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Splinefont in FontForge through 20230101 allows command injection viacrafted archives or compressed files.

criterions.comment: fontforge: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
